fields.name: Id
fields.description: The ID of the storage account resource. Video Analyzer relies on tables, queues, and blobs. The primary storage account must be a Standard Storage account (either Microsoft.ClassicStorage or Microsoft.Storage).

fields.name: Identity
fields.description: A managed identity that Video Analyzer will use to access the storage account.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The current status of the storage account mapping.
